product_name: Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus Sleeping Pad - Women's
long_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 4-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus women's sleeping pad is one of the warmest, self-inflating mattresses in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line. Designed specifically for women, this pad features extra insulation in the torso and foot area to keep even the coldest sleepers warm and comfortable. Extra insulation also makes the Therm-a-rest ProLite Plus ideal for ski touring, cold-weather expeditions and winter camping. New tapered shape reduces weight by 10% from previous year. ProLite Plus is engineered with innovative diagonal die-cut foam to reduce heat loss and provide efficient insulation. Stuff sack included.
short_description: Lighter than its predecessor, this 4-season Therm-a-Rest ProLite Plus women's sleeping pad is one of the warmest, self-inflating mattresses in the Therm-a-Rest Fast & Light line.
